QuestData.Title: The Road to Kun-Lai
QuestData.Description: Lorewalker Cho has sent word that several of your companions survived the conflict in the Jade Forest and have been moved to Kun-Lai Summit to seek healing.$b$bThey need your help if they are to survive!$b$bTo reach Kun-Lai Summit, travel to the Valley of the Four Winds and look for the Highroad Grummle that can be found at the base of the Veiled Stair along the northeastern border.$b$bThey can guide you the rest of the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the Veiled Stair to Binan Village.
